items.summary: Update the frontend routing to use hash-based URLs (e.g., /#/dashboard) so page refreshes and deep-links work on ICP asset canisters without server-side rewrites. Implement this using the existing TanStack Router setup (not react-router-dom), configuring the router to use hash history.
Adjust the Vite build configuration to use relative asset paths for ICP static hosting by setting Vite base to './' (and keep production build compatibility).

Add a user-visible top-level error fallback so unexpected runtime errors during app/router rendering do not appear as a blank white screen. Use existing in-repo fallback components where possible and keep user-facing text in English.
